comments: White (SAS) makes incidental contact with Graham's (CHA) arm after the release of his jump shot attempt.
Washington (CHA) and Gay (SAS) make incidental contact with each other as they go for the rebound.
Washignton (CHA) makes contact with DeRozan's (SAS) body after his gather that affects his driving shot attempt.
Gay (SAS) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jumps shot attempt by moving to his side as he closes out.
Bridges (CHA) is not established in a legal guarding position in DeRozan's (SAS) path as he makes his move to the basket and he makes contact to DeRozan's arm that affects his driving shot attempt.
Mils (SAS) and Graham (CHA) engage and disengage with one another off ball.
Mills (SAS) places his arm to Rozier's (CHA) side and marginal contact occurs during his driving to the basket.
Mills (SAS) makes marginal contact with Hayward's (CHA) body off ball that does not affect his ability to get to the pass.
Hayward (CHA) places his arm against Mills (SAS) and releases from contact as he spins.
White (SAS) dislodges the ball from Hayward (CHA) during his drive before incidental contact occurs.
Hayward (CHA) dislodges White (SAS) from his position as they pursue the loose ball.
Johnson (SAS) wraps Hayward (CHA) during the inbound, affecting his ability to get to the pass.
Bridges (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Murray's (SAS) path and makes marginal contact as they disengage.
Murray (SAS) commits a take foul on Rozier (CHA).
Johnson (SAS) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Martin (CHA) moves alongside of DeRozan's (SAS) path and marginal contact occurs during his driving shot attempt.
Johnson (SAS) reaches across Hayward's (CHA) body and makes contact that affects his ability to gather the pass.
Poeltl (SAS) clamps Washington's (CHA) arm during the screen and the contact affects his ability to defend the play.
